review: He is a good doctor and too much familiar. He has operated my mother leg femur broken place and my mother is good. My mother is still his observation. I am really satisfied for his all type of support. After operation within month my mother was stabled and standing in the floor.  So I wish him long life and support all patients as usual. Thank you Sir.

Dr. Hazra's explanation and over all communications is too good and easy understoodabl to explain.
Friendly.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Knee Pain Treatment,Hip Pain Treatment,Foot & Ankle,
review: I visited the doctor regarding my motherâ€™s knee, hip and ankle pain problem in Hindustan Health Point, Garia. But after visiting the the doctor, I think I am not satisfied with his treatment. He came to the clinic at least 45 minutes late and he just gave 5-7minutes to check my mother. He asked my mother about her problems and wrote down all the problems on his pad and wrote to do 7 types of tests and gave two medicines to take. Nothing was explained by him. Just told us to visit him one week later with all the test reports. For this 7 minutes consultation he is charging 800/-
